Articles.Content:
Am back in school !

3d animation ! and was installing all the good stuff ( maya zbrush photoshop intuos 4 drivers )

Uninstalling all the huge game (bf4 cod crysis3 etc ) !

Then i seen KSP... was like omg i cant !

Its impossible to do that ! So much memories of drunken flying over the mun and exploding ! exploding on the lauch pad ! exploding ! exploding ! exploding !

I really think that i have to much respect for that game ! Its so ambitious. Its where my goal should go for.

Ubisoft in my city have a huge place (Quebec city ) For noting Ubi would get me !

But KSP damn i would work there for free lol !!

thx ! ( this is for the secretary students in my schools )
